chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following problem:

I didn't receive the charging cable for my phone.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The cable doesn’t work. 

Therefore, the customer wishes to receive a functional cable.

Thank you for helping us satisfy our customer. 

Thank you for understanding,
Fifaliana from Back Market

Dear Backcare,  please relay the following message to the customer.

We are sorry for this inconvenience caused. Would you accept a commercial gesture of 10 euros to avoid the hassle of shipping a charging cable and to save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers to facilitate the shipment? With the money, the customer would be able to purchase a charging cable of their choice.  Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

The customer’s choice is the replacement of his cable, please proceed to this. 

Regards,
Suzie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We regret to inform you that we do not have any available stocks for replacement of the cable. Would the customer be open to accepting the commercial gesture of 10 euros instead? Thank you for yoour cooperation and understanding.

Regards,
AS
